definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: The water feed whole-course control system used in China-bult 300MW unit is described.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了国产300MW机组的锅炉给水全程控制系统。

sentences.english: It puts forward new demands to domestic energy efficiency chillers.
sentences.chinese: 这对国内冷水机组能效比的提高提出了新的要求。

sentences.english: Initial reports indicate that seven crewmembers were killed in the crash.
sentences.chinese: 初步报告显示，有7名机组人员在空难中丧生。

sentences.english: The company said that is not white smoke rising from the unit fuel storage pool.
sentences.chinese: 该公司说，白烟并非从机组燃料储存池中升起。

sentences.english: The well- drilled crew managed to rescue most of the passengers.
sentences.chinese: 训练有素的机组人员设法营救出了大部分乘客。

sentences.english: A novel unit maintenance scheduling (UMS) model based on the competitive market mechanism is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 构建了基于市场竞争机制的机组检修规划模型。

sentences.english: The Dynamic Simulation models of typical controlled processes of wind turbine are established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了风力发电机组典型受控过程的动态仿真模型。

sentences.english: Development and Application of Continuous Rolling Mill Set for Round Aluminum Pole in Qingtongxia Aluminum Group Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 电工圆铝杆连铸连轧机组在我公司的发展应用。

sentences.english: The station consists of 3 power-generating units.
sentences.chinese: 该电站由三个发电机组组成。

sentences.english: The degree of supercooling of condensate influences greatly the safe and economic operation performance of units.
sentences.chinese: 凝结水过冷度对机组的安全和经济运行有重要的影响。

sentences.english: The combined heat and power unit turbine control systems were studied.
sentences.chinese: 并对热电联产机组汽机控制系统进行了分析。

sentences.english: There were also 12 French crew members on board.
sentences.chinese: 机上还包括12名法国籍机组人员。

sentences.english: Check the joining su ces of the generator bearing after finishing the unit alignment.
sentences.chinese: 机组再对中完工后，检查发电机轴承接合面良好。

sentences.english: The LP casing blade of unit 3 in Tuoketuo Power Plant is broken after only three months operation.
sentences.chinese: 托电3号机组低压缸叶片运行仅3个月就发生了断裂。

sentences.english: Taking the tractor-plough combination as an example, several conclusions have been made.
sentences.chinese: 并以犁耕机组为例，得出了某些结论。

sentences.english: Oil pump units are the key instruments in crude oil transportation system.
sentences.chinese: 输油泵机组是原油集输系统的关键设备。

definition: to load/to charge/to feed (esp. a machine)
